incident_updates.body: green is experiencing degraded availability. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.
We are investigating reports of issues with service(s): multiple services. We will continue to keep users updated on progress towards mitigation.

Actions, API Requests, Codespaces, Issues, Packages, Pages, Pull Requests and Webhooks are now experiencing degraded availability. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.
